resources.string: Manage domains forbidden by local policy.
Enter the root domain (e.g., example.com). Subdomains will automatically be blocked by the AI engine.
URLs from these domains will always be marked as safe. Use with caution.
Allowlisted domains bypass all security checks. Only add domains you fully trust.
